content:
**You are verified when have both phone and email on your Discord account.**
1. To verify on **mobile** use mobile screenshot 
2. To verify on **desktop** use desktop screenshot 
3. If you get a **phone number on another account** error go here https://discord.com/channels/1242249109298221066/1284912441981010043/1285337767802310778

If you get the message "*this phone is used on another account*"
**Even if you only have one account**
The steps are explained on this Discord page with screenshots.
Important: use a DIFFERENT email on the second account when you remove the phone. https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413460214807-How-to-Remove-a-Phone-Number#h_01FQFTDJQP5D3XMMSDT3CJQGPR
**Leave a reply here if you want to walk you through this on a Zoom screenshare.**
## send me a DM if you need help
